Class AudioMixer

Namespace
osu.Framework.Audio.Mixing
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Mixes together multiple IAudioChannels into one output.

public abstract class AudioMixer : AudioComponent, IDisposable, IUpdateable, IAudioMixer

Constructors

AudioMixer(AudioMixer?, string)

Creates a new AudioMixer.

protected AudioMixer(AudioMixer? fallbackMixer, string identifier)

Parameters

fallbackMixer AudioMixer

A fallback AudioMixer, which IAudioChannels are moved to if removed from this one. A null value indicates this is the fallback AudioMixer.

identifier string

An identifier displayed on the audio mixer visualiser.

Fields

Identifier 

public readonly string Identifier

Field Value

string

Methods

Add(IAudioChannel)

Adds a channel to the mix.

public void Add(IAudioChannel channel)

Parameters

channel IAudioChannel

The channel to add.

AddEffect(IEffectParameter, int)

Applies an effect to the mixer.

public abstract void AddEffect(IEffectParameter effect, int priority = 0)

Parameters

effect IEffectParameter

The effect (e.g. ManagedBass.Fx.BQFEffect.

priority int

The effect priority. Lower values indicate higher priority and negative values are allowed. When there are multiple effects with the same priority, their ordering depends on the order in which they are added to the IAudioMixer.

AddInternal(IAudioChannel)

Adds an IAudioChannel to the mix.

protected abstract void AddInternal(IAudioChannel channel)

Parameters

channel IAudioChannel

The IAudioChannel to add.

Removes an IAudioChannel from the mix.

protected void Remove(IAudioChannel channel, bool returnToDefault)

Parameters

channel IAudioChannel

The IAudioChannel to remove.

returnToDefault bool

Whether channel should be returned to the default mixer.
